summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CallBot Analytics System migration from Firebase to MongoDB. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate) with JWT authentication, MongoDB integration, and SignalWire configuration working properly. Frontend login interface was fixed and is now operational, but some session management and navigation issues remain.

minor_issues.issue: WebSocket connection fails on dashboard load
minor_issues.impact: Real-time call event monitoring not working

ui_bugs.issue: Session management issue causing redirect to login after successful authentication
Navigation items not properly rendered or clickable

integration_issues.issue: User session not maintained after login redirect to dashboard

passed_tests: Frontend login form rendering and functionality
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend session management and dashboard navigation issues. The authentication works but user session is not properly maintained after login, causing dashboard components to not render correctly. Also investigate WebSocket connection issues for real-time call monitoring.
